name: 鍾建屏
objective:
本課程教授內容包括外匯理論與實務操作，課程內容包括： 1. 探討有那些因素會影響匯率的波動以及均衡匯率的決定，並以實務案例，引導學生得以學習到外匯交易的知識，並懂得結合外匯交易的理論與實務來建置自己的外匯交易策略，進行正確的外匯投資操作。2. 透過對外匯市場交易之思考、探討、批判與洞察，來打造最適合的外匯交易策略，進而提升外匯專業之操作能力。
This course prepares students to effectively analyze, assess, and trade foreign currency in the FOREX spot market. Topics presented during the course include: models of success and historical evidence on buying and selling patterns, how to understand volatility of return on the foreign currency exchange, the price behavior of currency, and technical tools for analysis including Japanese Candlesticks and Bar charts. The course focuses on foreign exchange market, major players in the FOREX market, spot and forward market, currency futures and options, foreign exchange exposure and risk, FOREX traders and trading, technical analysis in the FOREX market, profiles of the world’s major currencies and their characteristics.
